critique: The document expresses concern about the situation in Sudan and aims to support a transition to democracy. It conveys a sense of determination to address the threat to national security and foreign policy. There's a hint of sadness regarding the conflict and human rights abuses in Sudan. There's a sense of disgust regarding the actions that undermine democratic processes. There is a sense of surprise regarding the military's seizure of power in October 2021 and the outbreak of inter-service fighting in April 2023.
